argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | posi.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | posi.l | |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) |
| 3 |  | #P_id | |- ( X e. B -> X e. B ) |
| 4 | 3, 3, 3 | #P_3jca | |- ( X e. B -> ( X e. B /\ X e. B /\ X e. B ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_posi | |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ ( X e. B /\ X e. B /\ X e. B ) ) -> ( X .<_ X /\ ( ( X .<_ X /\ X .<_ X ) -> X = X ) /\ ( ( X .<_ X /\ X .<_ X ) -> X .<_ X ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ X e. B ) -> ( X .<_ X /\ ( ( X .<_ X /\ X .<_ X ) -> X = X ) /\ ( ( X .<_ X /\ X .<_ X ) -> X .<_ X ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_simp1d | |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ X e. B ) -> X .<_ X ) |
\
 A poset ordering is reflexive.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2011.) Obsolete version of ~ posref as of 25-Mar-2020. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
